Junior Frontend Developer.additional-module-2: BBH is committed to diversity, innovation and globalization. Our culture is driven by our goal to provide the best solutions and services to our clients and each other. Our Partnership structure creates a flat organization that promotes collaboration across all business lines. We believe that diverse ideas and the ability to come together globally across groups and borders are a competitive advantage. In order for all our teams to excel, members must trust each other and feel comfortable providing honest input from all perspectives.This openness sparks innovation and agility, which adds to the entrepreneurial spirit and provides many more career opportunities for our staff. We are a group of high-performing, dedicated and caring professionals who believe that working together is the foundation for superior client service excellence.As a BBH professional, your career path is yours to define. We take pride in our ability to retain our best employees. We help them manage their careers by moving top performers to new areas of BBH where their talents will make the greatest contribution. As soon as you walk through the doors at BBH, we provide you with the tools to help you succeed and grow your career.
Junior Frontend Developer.additional-module-3: What You Can Expect At BBH:If you join BBH you will a find collaborative environment that enables you to step outside your role to add value wherever you can. You will have direct access to clients, information and experts across all business areas around the world. BBH will provide you with opportunities to grow your expertise, take on new challenges, and reinvent yourselfâ€”without leaving the firm. We encourage a culture of inclusion that values each employeeâ€™s unique perspective. We provide a high-quality benefits program emphasizing good health, financial security, and peace of mind. Ultimately we want you to have rewarding work with the flexibility to enjoy personal and family experiences at every career stage. Our BBH Cares program offers volunteer opportunities to give back to your community and help transform the lives of others.At Brown Brothers Harriman, we believe no job is too big or small for any of us to handle if it helps our clients. We value passionate, committed people who enjoy collaborating with others to find new solutions to complex business challenges. We are looking for the type of person who speaks their mind, truly listens and steps outside their role to add value wherever they can. Someone who is driven to get things done and views obstacles as an exciting challenge that demands a creative solution. Above all, we seek someone who takes great pride in their work and is inspired and motivated by their role in protecting and enhancing our clientâ€™s financial well-being.If you are looking for an entrepreneurial environment where you can learn and thrive, Brown Brothers Harriman is the right place for you.

Software Engineer Intern.about-project-1: About the projectAre you looking for a work environment where you can innovate, reach greater heights and collaborate with experts from a wide range of sectors? You want to join a world-class company and industry leader with projects to which you would be proud to contribute? Come share your passion with us!The CAE Summer Internship is a three-month long full-time paid internship. It starts on the 1st of July. Once you complete the internship, you will have a real chance to stay with CAE as a full-time or part-time employee.As an Intern at CAE you are part of program team which strives to, not only meets, but exceeds our customersâ€™ expectations. Software Engineers at CAEâ€™s Flight Operations Solutions support end-to-end solution that improves decision making by using data across the entire operation for Spanning crew, flight movement, airport, on-board catering, and cost management.Airlines worldwide rely on the intelligent and mobile-enabled tools to track over 54 million flights per year, while supporting over 200 000 crew members across every major alliance.The role we are offering you:We are looking for several Software Engineering / Computer Science students who are eager to learn while assisting with multitude of software related tasks in our Computer Tools, Computer Systems and Integration Specialists group, as well as others.This year weâ€™re looking for interns willing to work in roles like:* Java Software Engineer* C++ Software Engineer* C# Software Engineer* Front-end Engineer (React)* Business Analyst* SQL Database developer* DevOps* Operation Research

Learn about fascinating and challenging airlines operations industry?

responsibilities-1: Develop embedded software for power distribution and protection technologies.
Participate in all phases of the software development lifecycle (Requirements, Design, Coding, Testing).
Apply the appropriate software standards, processes, procedures, and tools throughout the software development life cycle.

Interact with the software team and other disciplines to investigate issues and create solutions.
Partner with the software project lead to create software development plans, milestones, effort estimations, and testing requirements.
Stay abreast of hybrid/electric, and power distribution and protection technologies.
Maintain close coordination with software project lead to deliver products on time, on budget, and to specification and certification requirements.
On-site customer support, as needed, to collect data for issue analysis, reflashing, and customer meetings.
Support manufacturing/production, as needed, with reflashing, end of line testing, and issue investigation.

database monitoring: maintaining the performance and security of database systems

providing 1st and 2nd Line Service Desk support
assessing and recommending new technologies to improve the current workflow
participation in international projects

excellent command of English and Polish

Python Developer.about-project-1: About the projectThe Profiler extracts more than 5,000 attributes about every single end-user, gathered throughout direct channels to fuel machine learning models with more knowledge and boost fraud detection accuracy. The technology creates a complete profile of a user from declared and undeclared data about the user's device, network, and behaviour.Itâ€™s an in-depth screening of a user who will no longer trick by system emulations or spoofing.On a daily basis, you will work on a state-of-the-art anti-fraud solution, implement cutting-edge device fingerprinting and user identification algorithms as well as develop back-end services ingesting vast amounts of data from internal and external sources.We are looking for an Python Developer with strong back-end development experience and a decent knowledge of Javascript to join the Web Profilers team responsible for our client-facing services.
responsibilities-1: Creating new features (code, tests, documentation) from PoC to production in the context of fraud detection (for example creation of a modified DNS server, design & creation of various microservices used for detection of VPNs like a port scanner, designing methods of technical detection of tools used by fraudsters) and maintaining current ones (optimizations, bug fixes)
Working on the public and internal API backends
Conducting code reviews
Helping with architecture-level design decisions during various phases of work
Developing experimental browser technologies
Writing reliable and maintainable user profiling code capable of running on a wide range of browsers
Writing efficient code and profiling its performance ensuring its capable of running on low-end devices and in bad network conditions
Providing rock-solid behaviour of the library in a third-party environment outside the control
Providing automated tests of created code

Experience in using Docker, Kubernetes (from the application developer side)

Fluency in the basic usage of Unix terminal and Git

Familiarity with the following topics: Internet protocols, Browser Cache, Authentication mechanisms, web-applications performance, Unix, Encoding, Encryption, and other things related to web-applications
Interest in security & broad IT knowledge (from various technologies to low-level network protocols)
Fluency in English

Senior Fullstack Software Engineer.additional-module-1: What does the Sports Media Team work on?We build platforms and products that collect, curate, distribute, analyze, and personalize sports data and content.We have exclusive data rights with top leagues like MLB, NBA, NHL, and NASCAR where we own the rights to data coming from the stadium (even player tracking and optical tracking data). For other leagues/sports like NFL, NCAA Basketball, NCAA Football, Golf, and more, we build custom tooling used by our scouting network. We pride ourselves on delivering the fastest and most accurate live game data on the market, and the systems our team builds make that possible.Through our Sports APIs, we empower developers from thousands of customers like Apple, Google, Amazon, Facebook, The Score, Bleacher Report, and many more, to create their own products powered by our data.With our Analytics Products and Broadcast Solutions, we empower storytellers from Fox Sports, Bally Sports, CBS Sports, NBC Sports, and more, to create storylines around the game action and to create the broadcast seen by millions of fans on TV. For example, if you watch the World Series, Super Bowl or just your team playing on TV, and wonder how the announcers know all those stats and storylines, and how they power all those graphic overlays, well, that is our doing.
Senior Fullstack Software Engineer.additional-module-2: More about SportradarSportradar is focused on going beyond the raw data to drive insights and engaging experiences in the marketplace. Youâ€™ll get to work with the latest tools and technologies to drive innovation and bring new products to market. We are a truly international business employing over 2,000 people in more than 30 locations around the world. Our rapid growth has been driven by technological innovation alongside an understanding of our clientsâ€™ business needs. It is our commitment to excellent service, quality, and reliability that makes us the trusted partner of more than 1,000 companies in over 100 countries.We occupy a unique position at the intersection of the sports, media and betting industries. This creates an exciting and fast-moving working environment that rewards creative thinking and hard work. We are passionate about what we do, and we care passionately about our people.If you think you are up to the challenge, come and help us to grow, innovate and develop!Sportradar intends to offer the selected candidate base, dependent on job- related, non-discriminatory factors including but not limited to experience, qualifications, and location. Base pay is just one component of the Total Rewards that Sportradar provides to compensate and recognize employees for their work. Sportradar offers best-in-class benefits such as a comprehensive benefits package, performance bonus program, equity stock. Please consult with your recruiter to learn more as all benefits are subject to eligibility requirements.

Senior Platform Java Developer.about-project-1: About the projectWe are looking for engineers with at least 5 years of experience with commercial software development in the Java ecosystem at the same time understand the business needs, to be able to create a coherent, modern platform as the foundation for built applications.The platform team consists of 4 people + Engineering Manager. 2 people are involved in development (we are looking for the 3rd), and 2 are involved in prototyping.The team prepares abstract solutions for product teams, through programming in pure Java. These are solutions like libraries, aspects related to security, authentication, metrics, and mechanisms to collect logs or to communicate etc.. The team looks after microservices and creates them from scratch. They design these things (architectural areas) and deliver them in cooperation with product teams and DevOps Engineers.
responsibilities-1: Developing the Kitopi Platform, which is understood as a set of mechanisms, libraries, tools, and pipelines to be used in our applications. So that the created solution is consistent, safe, scalable, and easy to develop.
Working closely with the DevOps team to develop an architecture that benefits from the Cloud.
Being involved at every stage of the solution development. Starting from designing a solution, through implementation and deployment. Ending with the support of productive solutions.
Sharing knowledge and communicating with others.

FullStack Developer.about-project-1: About the projectThe role would suit someone who has a strong background in the full development stack, with a genuine interest in the frontend development. We are looking for people who are enthusiastic and willing to contribute on how we work and help evolve the technology we use.You will be working as part of a small full-stack agile development team based in Edinburgh, whoâ€™s main technologies and frameworks include dotNet, C#, VueJs, Angular, Umbraco CMS, Jenkins, Agile, APIâ€™s, Service-Oriented-Architecture, SQL.The projects and systems that the teams are involved in have a high exposure to either our customers, reservations departments, online travel partners and agents and are highly business critical.You will ideally have gained solid experience as a Full Stack Developer with commercial experience participating in the design and development phases of Enterprise Applications.We have a broad technology stack, with a focus on Microsoft technology, therefore experience with or a genuine interest to deepen dotNet knowledge is a big plus.

Senior Backend Developer.about-project-1: About the projectYou wonâ€™t be working on your own - each project is assigned its own SCRUM team consisting of Senior and Junior developers, both frontend and backend, DevOps engineers, product owners, as well as UX/UI designers, software tester, and a business analyst.Our experience comes from implementing MES solutions for companies like SpaceX, CoorsTek, Bombardier, Sierra Nevada Corporation, and many othersâ€¦Our tech stackâ€¢	Our frontend is built in micro-frontend architecture, using the latest Angular. You choose the form of your employment (employment or B2B contract), as well as whether you want to work from our office in Krakow or your home. We care for our people and their health, which is why we provide life insurance and excellent private healthcare plan. We also very actively sponsor many programs to motivate our team to spend their free time actively.Exciting projects. Youâ€™ll be working with innovative manufacturing companies in industries like aerospace or renewable technology alongside former SpaceX employees.Perks like Multisport and MyBenefit cafeteria memberships, company retreats, and donuts on us in the office every Thursday. To fulfill them, we are looking for talented Developers to join us. As a member of the CERD Team, you will be responsible for developing R&D products that maintain and augment our rich text editors with ambitious features. Right now the team is busy with a conversion library written in Node.js used for transforming HTML into MS Word files and reversed conversion, from MS Word to HTML. As the project is relatively young, your main responsibility will be creating new features. You will be working on:â€¢	Import from Word, a fast and highly scalable service enabling the user to import content from Microsoft Word to HTMLâ€¢	Export to Word, a service converting HTML to one of the most popular documents format, Microsoft Word
